I've always liked this song, but it's not until you go through the things the lyrics talk about for it to really resonate you. My girlfriend of 5 years wanted to end it with me saying she's fallen out of love with me, but I still love her as much as I did when we first met. I used to think the lyrics "I promise, I swear to you I'll be okay, you're only the love of my life" were a bit melodramatic, but now they explain exactly how I feel, as does the rest of this song. Seeing someone continue to be happy without you while you're heartbroken over them is torture.

I met a girl back in 10th grade whom I asked to be my girlfriend without really expecting her to say yes. She agreed three days later and well it just felt like I was in heaven. In the end though she had to move back to her home which was really far away from where I live, and couple that with a couple of issue we had t deal with, we were forced to end things.  I'm in college now and she is too, last I heard she's with someone and I'm glad she is, and I really hope she's happy. But even though I've had a couple of heartbreaks after her, I still miss her like I did the first day after our break up and I guess this song is my way of coping with since I put it on everytime I start to miss her again :)
